description:
Executive Assistant - $115k
Role: Executive Assistant
Location: West Los Angeles
Compensation: $115k, DOE + a discretionary bonus, paid OT, strong benefits, and more!
Company: Premier Financial Services Firm
Duties: Executive Assistant needed to provide top-notch support to a handful of executives! Daily responsibilities will include managing multiple calendars, coordinating travel arrangements, processing expense reports, creating presentation materials, handling correspondence, supporting various projects, and assisting with ad-hoc office management tasks.
Why work here: This company offers the chance to work with a close-knit, collegial group of individuals. In this role, you’ll partner with a team of other administrative professionals, along with colleagues across departments. In addition to the competitive salary and benefits package, this company also offers a hybrid work schedule.
Qualified candidates will have 5+ years of administrative support experience (corporate or professional services highly preferred), MS Office proficiency, excellent organization, and a high level of professionalism.
If you are interested, please apply today! (No calls, please)
